recipe_name: Marinated courgette, lemon, gorgonzola and sesame salad
author: James Tanner
method: Combine all the ingredients except the sesame seeds in a bowl and mix until combined. Leave to marinate for 5 minutes. To serve, sprinkle over the sesame seeds.
ingredients: ½ courgette, finely sliced,  2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil,  ½ lemon, juice only,  55g/2oz gorgonzola (or a similar vegetarian blue cheese), crumbled,  1 tbsp chopped fresh coriander leaves,  1 tbsp chopped fresh mint leaves,  1 tsp sesame seed, to serve
